references: H. W. Gould, Binomial coefficients, the bracket function and compositions with relatively prime summands, Fib. Quart. 2 (1964), 241-260. Math. Rev. 30 #1090
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>0} x^k/((1+x)^k-x^k).G.f.: Sum_{k>0} tau(k)*x^k/(1+x)^k. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 24 2003G.f.: sum(n>=1, z^n/(1-z^n)) (Lambert series) where z=x/(1+x) - Joerg Arndt, Jan 30 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
